TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdamInstance extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer

summary.span: 클래스는 AD LDS 인스턴스 서버를 나타냅니다.

span.span: The class represents an AD LDS instance server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 클래스 참조를 응용 프로그램 모드 ADAM (Active Directory)는 Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS)로 바뀌었습니다.The class refers to Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) which has been renamed to Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).

span.span: Demand value:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CheckReplicationConsistency() cil managed

summary.span: 이 AD LDS 인스턴스의 복제 토폴로지를 확인하는 KCC(정보 일관성 검사)를 호출합니다.

span.span: Invokes the Knowledge Consistency Checker (KCC) that verifies the replication topology for this AD LDS instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 자세한 내용은 MSDN library에서 "DsReplicaConsistencyCheck" 항목을 참조 [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)합니다.For more information, see the topic "DsReplicaConsistencyCheck" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

span.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

span.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 관리되는 리소스를 해제해야 하는 경우를 결정하는 값입니다.

span.span: A value that determines if the managed resources should be released.

param.span: 관리되는 리소스가 해제되어야 하면 이고, 관리되지 않는 리소스만 해제되어야 하면 입니다.

span.span: if the managed resources should be released; if only the unmanaged resources should be released.

summary.span: 개체에서 사용하는 관리되지 않는 리소스를 해제하고 관리되는 리소스를 선택적으로 해제합니다.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object and, optionally, releases managed resources.
